name: Ohanko
description:
«In a uchrony where the dinosaurs never disappeared and where humans have managed to coexist with them, you embody an young Indian boy rebelling against the colonists.»

Ohanko is an open-world adventure game in a universe where humans live with dinosaurs. The player embodies Yuma, a young Amerindian shaman who will try to recover the lands of his people stolen by the colonists.
